    • Constructor Detail

      • Plane

        public Plane(int id,
     double velocity,
     int altitude,
     double bearing,
     Game currentGame)
        Constructor for Plane

        Initialises the plane's position and general information about the flight.

        Parameters:
        id - a unique identifier
        crew - the number of crew on board
        size - the size to display the plane at
        velocity - the speed at which the plane is traveling
        altitude - the altitude at which the plane is traveling
        bearing - the bearing the plane is following (in radians)
        x - the x position to create the plane at
        y - the y position to create the plane at

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfFlightAtWaypoint

        public boolean checkIfFlightAtWaypoint(Point waypoint,
                              Game game)
        Determine whether a plane is currently at waypoint
        Parameters:
        waypoint - The waypoint which is currently being checked
        game - Required by Slick2D library
        Returns:
        Boolean which is set to true if a flight is currently at the waypoint; false otherwise

      • incrementBearing

        public void incrementBearing()
        Increments the Plane's bearing by 5 degrees

      • decrementBearing

        public void decrementBearing()
        Decrements the Plane's bearing by 5 degrees

      • incrementAltitude

        public void incrementAltitude()
        Increments the Plane's altitude to the next flight level

        Note: highest flight level allowed for planes is 4

      • decrementAltitude

        public void decrementAltitude()
        Decrements the Plane's target altitude to the next flight level

        Note: lowest flight level allowed for planes is 1

      • incrementTargetAltitude

        public void incrementTargetAltitude()
        Increments the Plane's target altitude to the next flight level

        Note: highest flight level allowed for planes is 4

      • decrementTargetAltitude

        public void decrementTargetAltitude()
        Decrements the altitude by 1000 units, so long as the current altitude is greater than or equal to 3000

      • calculateBearingToNextWaypoint

        public void calculateBearingToNextWaypoint()
        Calculates bearing from plane's current position to its next waypoint This is done so planes follow their flight plan automatically

      • updateCurrentBearing

        public void updateCurrentBearing()
        Updates current bearing

      • findLandingDescentRate

        public double findLandingDescentRate()
        Calculates the rate at which a plane has to descend, given its current altitude, such that by the time it reaches the runway, its altitude is 0
        Returns:
        Rate at which plane needs to descend

      • land

        public void land()
        First checks that another plane is not landing, then checks whether plane is in valid position to initiate landing before finally checking that the plane's current bearing is such that the plane is facing the runway. If all these conditions are met, the plane begins to land.

      • takeOff

        public void takeOff()
        Method to take off. Plane is assigned a velocity upon taking off, and is deselected so the user can't change the course while the plane is in the process of taking off

      • updatePlaneAltitude

        public void updatePlaneAltitude()
        Method to update altitude First it checks whether the plane is landing, in which case the altitude decreases according to the landing descent rate Otherwise, the altitude changes towards the desired altitude at a constant speed, incrementally.

      • movePlane

        public void movePlane()
        Moves a plane

        If the plane is under manual control, it will follow the bearing specified by the player.

        If the plane is following its flight path, it will tend towards its next target.

        Parameters:
        plane - the plane to move
